reviews.review: 首先五星好评，这个是省不了的!我未玩过一代，只是以前略有耳闻，完全不了解操作的我甚至在新手关晃晃悠悠的走了十来分钟，咦？这是什么？诶？我怎么一直在附近绕圈？十几分钟过去了我才知道原来两个传送门是互通的（尴尬），知道基础原理之后，后面几关就如鱼得水了，第一次卡关（不要跟我说新手教程_(:з」∠)_）是在刚开始接触光桥那一部分，原谅我眼拙，愣是没看到墙边有可以布置传送门的点，一直在找绕后的方法，卡了多久我也不确定，大概半小时是有的……后面的关卡不断出现新玩法，也可以让人沉浸其中玩下去，现在也就玩了几个小时吧，相信之后的关卡不会让我失望，通关了再去合作模式和创意工坊找新花样，真的没想到一个打折才不过六七块的游戏可以让我这么热衷，再次好评!
после этой игры я понял что я тупой
Одна из лучших игр на все времена рекомендую!!!!!!!!!!
игра топ проходил 3 раз для съёмки видео приходилось думать долго

Really I have no words maybe I am not someone who laugh at jokes too much for me they were just really entertaining for listen but anyway Glados and Wheatley awesome characters, puzzles really addicting and ending is absolute masterpiece.
Probably one of the best puzzle games I've ever played.
i just finished the game and i need to say this game is incredible
очень хорошая игра прохожу уже 5 раз!

An excellent follow-up to the original game, I love it!
And the COOP move is really fun!

Почему Вам стоит поиграть в Portal 2 ?:
-Интересные и сложные уровни заставят подумать Ваш мозг.
Любителям головоломок точно понравится. 
-Можно пройти с другом.
-Увлекательный сюжет, дополняющий 1-ую часть.
-Игра на русском, а так же в ней есть русский дубляж.
-Более нормальный голос ГЛэДОС, не как в 1-ой части. 
-Мастерская с кучей карт (от сложных головоломок до race-карт от фанатов). 
-Вы сами можете попробовать создать свою карту, при помощи встроенного в игру редактора карт. 
-Офигеннейший финал и песня ГЛэДОС (за песню туреллей +rep). 

Вообщем, любителям (и не только) головоломок зайдёт данная игра. Фан-карты и кооперативный режим на 2-ух игроков завлекут Вас на не одну сотню часов. 
+Reр
This game is a masterpiece. I was so sad that I will not play something as amazing as this game again after completing it.
Wow it's good game not bad
Yes of i course , this game is amazing , he destroy my entire mind.
大佬们，加个好友一起玩吧，实在过不了，555（跪求）

Wow what an epic game , once I started didn't want to take a break and completed it all at once . The feeling you get when you complete a mind boggling level is just amazing . Also the story is so good which I didn't expected in a puzzle game plus the game is hilarious with amazing antagonists . The level design is just phenomenal and Cave Johnson recordings are comedic gold . The end boss fight was so good and satisfying . The game still holds up to date with amazing graphics and music . Just buy it !!

Portal 2 takes the beautiful atmosphere and mechanics of the original Portal, and improves on it with better graphics, unique sections, & an incredible story. If you liked Portal 1, you'll love Portal 2.
每天只能和朋友玩一关，然后就玩不了了，已经变成日常游戏了。
แก้ปริศนาเพลินๆ 10/10
很好玩，找好朋友一起玩
puzzle solving fun - only slight downside is sometimes too much story and not enough gameplay
Очень классная игра на движке соурс. Некоторые комнаты мозги запарили.
great game buy it its also cheap
There is not a type of person I wouldn't recommend this game to.
Really fun game mechanics and creative level design!
传送门2代依然是神作！在继承1代优点的情况下还有更多新玩法加入，剧情衔接1代，且更有意思，真的佩服开发者的创意十足！

Portral2 en sevdiğim oyunlardan. Aslında hikaye oyunlarını ve zeka oyunlarını pek sevmem ama Portal2 bana o tür oyunları sevdirdi. Başlarda pek sevmesemde harika bir oyundu. Bence hemen siz de alın. Stratejibnizi ve zekanızı geliştirip hem de eğlanmek istiyorsanız bu oyun tam size göre...

7块钱，很好玩，跟朋友玩也可以，真的超级赞。
但有一点要注意，晕3D的人慎玩！！！

Kupiona za 7,19zł na wyprzedaży. Żałuję że nie kupiłem już rok temu.
Jeśli chcesz dostać padaki i bólu głowy na niektórych poziomach to polecam :)
双人游戏  值得一起玩

Like the first Portal but MORE. The only thing done better in the first game is the horror atmosphere, other than that, the second is superior in every way. Better music, more levels, more intricate levels, new mechanics (which are really just mechanics from other valve games ei. slippery floor, bouncy platforms/puddles) Potentially valve's magnum opus, Portal 2 delivers beyond expectation in every aspect a sequel possibly can. 

Although the performance was amazing, wheatley is unfortunately one of Stephen Merchant's least funny roles. One gripe is the very 2012 "lolz so random" sense of humor does get laid on too thick, but it ends up kind of motivating you in a way to get away from his voice sooner so you can hurry up and hear JK Simmons great performance.

This is legitimately one of the best games ever made. Valve should learn to count higher than 2 if only for this game but I have no idea how they could follow this up.

In addition, this has the most interactive co-op experience in all of gaming.

当你成为世界上最后一个人，或者世界上最后一个女人，该怎么办。

从黑山到光圈，从外星到AI。我们和外界的关系是怎样的？或者说与智能的关系是怎样的？智能重要的的是灵魂还是载体？发展需要的是道路还是自由？

十年前的盗版体验和补票之后的感悟是完全的两个世界。
十年前游戏只是游戏，游戏结束，作业照写生活依旧。十年后从未想过游戏和现实如此贴切Chell在和机器斗智斗勇，现实中我也不会出门和机器soloplay。游戏中的机器和现实中的机器一样，亦敌亦友。mata元素渗透在valve的每一处细节之中，所以真实感才会在游戏中被普遍感受。
这是区别与其他成功被定义了的被制作人量化了的游戏，血条，货币，任务，经济，关系，npc。和witness一样。在谜题中认识自己，而不是在系统中趋于同一。这才应该是游戏原本的初心，也是其最初的雏形，也是以前游戏打动人的起因。是玩法而不是虚幻的成就感驱使着游戏前进，这在很多老游戏上都能看到影子。在那个计算机能不足，图形处理低效的年代，一点一点一片片的像素也能令人感动。游戏由两部分组成，制作人和玩家。而在那个互联网刚刚萌芽的年代，玩家也是制作人 制作人也是玩家。
剧情和关卡的设计很巧妙！双人线也有剧情，剧情背景属于单人线的后续。总体不算太难，但也需要点思考和尝试。
别具一格的玩法，在FPS游戏里面绝对是独树一帜的存在。常规FPS玩腻了的话，传送门真的非常值得试一试！
Одна из лучших игр от valve
La trama es muy interesante y me gustaria que valve saque un tercera parte

10/10 Seriously if you haven't played this yet you're missing out.

This has to be another of the best games, I have been playing for as long as Black Ops 3, I hope you enjoy as well, but I do feel like after a few months it gets boring right? So then go ahead and get some Portal 2 Custom Maps or even better, make your own maps, You might have to use that BEEMOD if you want, but if you want to stay safe from viruses and try to make your own map without having beemod, then go ahead, that is what I am doing. But otherwise, try some maps and see if you still have bordom, if you do, then I don't know what to tell you, also get ready because Portal Modded are coming in April 2021. Check it out in the Steam Store, but anyways make sure you have this game in order to play that mode, and in conclusion, I think Portal 2 is one of my favorite games in the whole wideworld. Stay safe for these next 11 months or so
